document.docAuthor: He, Zhiqiang, Zhang, Yalin, Mckamey, Stuart H. & Zahniser, James N.
document.masterDocTitle: The Chinese Hecalina (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Deltocephalinae: Hecalini) with descriptions of a new genus and seven new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The Chinese Hecalina (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Deltocephalinae: Hecalini) with descriptions of a new genus and seven new species

caption.paragraph:
FIGURES 69–85.
Thomsonia porrecta
.
69, male adult, dorsal view; 70, female adult, dorsal view; 71, female anterior tentorium; 72, female left fore femur; 73, female left forewing; 74, female right hindwing; 75, female 7 th abdominal sternum; 76, 1 st valvulae; 77, apical part of 1 st valvulae; 78, 2 nd valvulae; 79, apical part of 2 nd valvulae; 80–81, aedeagus, lateral and ventral view respectively; 82, style, dorsal view; 83, connective, dorsal view; 84, male pygofer, lateral view; 85, subgenital plate.
